column2: i'l Pick summ from da pile...
After Victorious Battle one of your commanders approaches you, carrying an exquisite banner found amongst the enemy corpses...

'Da boyz around 'da Kamp talk that a great crafta i'z livin in [neighbor_province.GetName]. Maybyz I needz da send in boyz to fetch 'im [smith.GetManWoman] to my kamp to see [smith.GetHerHis] skilz for m'self. If [smith.GetSheHe] somehuw impress me, i wilz force him to crafta me ze item.
Gud idea, Nice of me' to zink dat...
I couldda use sum of da new stuf, Right?
I want'z slasha powa! Make me da Choppa!
I want'z somedi strung! Make me zoggin Ax!
I want'z krumpin powa! Make me da Great Club!.
I want'z stabba weak uns'! Make me da Stabba!
I want'z zem 'ard arma, to propa protec me' mussels.

Once the [GetWeaponArmorSmith]'s craftsmanship had been checked by my most knowledgeable attendants to ensure the quality was sufficient, I received [From.GetHerHim] in the throne room. [From.GetSheHeCap] introduced [From.GetHerselfHimself] as '[From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName]' and gestured towards [From.GetHerHis] numerous assistants, who all carried examples of [From.GetHerHis] work. 'Does my [Root.GetTitle] have anything special in mind?'

It haz been cupla de weeks since i ordered [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] to get me' da [From.GetWeaponsmithWeaponGreenskin], but he seemz strangely been walking with dat himself around da kamp...
I wa'z busy krumpin da weak un's when [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] came to speak ta me' dat he finished da [From.GetWeaponsmithWeaponGreenskin].

[FromFrom.GetMasterMistressCap] [FromFrom.GetTitledName] Intrigued by the request of usage of more of rarer materials has gotten [FromFrom.GetHerHim] all excited, and offers up couple of suggestions \n Either Use of Dark Meteorite or Scales of Sea Drake.

[FromFrom.GetMasterMistressCap] [FromFrom.GetTitledName] Intrigued by the request of usage of more of rarer materials has gotten [FromFrom.GetHerHim] all excited, and offers up couple of suggestions \n Either Use of Ithilmar or Forges of Vaul's Anvil.

[FromFrom.GetMasterMistressCap] [FromFrom.GetTitledName] Intrigued by the request of usage of more of rarer materials has gotten [FromFrom.GetHerHim] all excited, and offers up couple of suggestions \n Either Use of Ithilmar or Forges of Vaul's Anvil.\n [FromFrom.GetSheHe] also left you a note about Shadow Armour, while leaving you to decide...
Use up Scales from the Sea Drakes
Plead Assistance from the Smiths in Caledor to make Dragon Armour
I can Craft it my self
Request special crafted set of Gromril Armour...

The word around the court is that a remarkable [GetWeaponArmorSmith] is willing to help you. Perhaps I should invite the [smith.GetManWoman] to my court to see [smith.GetHerHis] work for myself. If [smith.GetSheHe] manages to impress me, I could order my own custom made item.
You have decided you are in need of an Rune to enhance your capabilities, But which kind you would prefer?
The crafting of the rune is finished...
You will send out word that you are in need of an Runesmith

Once [Root.job_treasurer.GetJobTitle] [Root.job_treasurer.GetFirstName] had assured that the [GetWeaponArmorSmith]'s craftsmanship left nothing to be desired, I received [From.GetHerHim] in the throne room. [From.GetSheHeCap] introduced [From.GetHerselfHimself] as '[From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName]' and gestured towards [From.GetHerHis] numerous assistants, who all carried examples of [From.GetHerHis] work. 'Does my [Root.GetTitle] have anything special in mind?'
Craft me using exquisite quality resources.
In an effort to convince my fellow runesmiths i have undertaken a task to Craft Rune for [fromfrom.GetFirstName].
In an effort to convince my fellow runesmiths i have undertaken a task to Craft Weapon for [fromfrom.GetFirstName].
In an effort to convince my fellow runesmiths i have undertaken a task to Craft Armour for [fromfrom.GetFirstName].
In an effort to convince my fellow runesmiths i have undertaken a task to Enscribe an Rune for [fromfrom.GetFirstName].
The work to craft the Rune for Lord [fromfromfrom.GetFirstName] is done, it is time to deliver the labour to [fromfromfrom.GetHerHim].
The work to craft the Weapon for Lord [fromfromfrom.GetFirstName] is done, it is time to deliver the labour to [fromfromfrom.GetHerHim].
The work to craft the Armour for Lord [fromfromfrom.GetFirstName] is done, it is time to deliver the labour to [fromfromfrom.GetHerHim].
It is Done, here take it.
Ah, it is finally done, time to turn it in.
Why wouldn't i just keep it for my self?
Why wouldn't i just keep it for my self?
I will double my efforts from now on!
I am thouroughly dissapointed in you, failing to fill in the order made by [client_target.GetFirstName], Such an missed oppoturnity to show off your skills...
I will visit the mountain side, to gather some materials...
Shows me options using assistance of better resources and Forges.
Shows Further options to use Either Sea Dragon Scales Or Meteorite
Let's See what the Dragon Scales is made of, Shall we?
Let's See what the Meteorite is made of, Shall we?
Darkness within the armour will be guarded well!
I am in need of skills of an Runesmith, find me an skilled Runesmith!
I am in need of a new Rune, find me an skilled Runesmith.!
Nicey Crafted [Root.GetWeaponTypeGreenskin] made fur da [Root.GetTitledName] by [From.GetTitledName].
With Death of [fromfromfrom.GetTitledFirstName], unfilling his slayer oath, it has fallen to you to retake the oath...
I shall continue my ancestor's oath!
This Petty Dream of my clan has been going on for long enough!
This sword is made by the elven smiths tho they smithing doesnt compare to the dwarfs is still higher quality weapon of the precious silverite.
This weapon is made of Ithilmar a metal to rival even gromril! a person with this weapon is sure to be a deadly warrior.
This spear is made by elven smiths and of silverite a metal precious to the elves in making weapons.
This weapon is made by the legandary ithilmar! this spear is sure to be deadly and precis.
Tho axes is not common among the elves but they are still deadly with axes as they would with any other weapon.
A battle axe made by the legendary Ithilmar, tho battle axes is not something used by most elves a few delve into the inner fury it requires to wield a weapon such as this.
Silverite armour is a common sight among the elven nobility but that´s because is both durable and light.
Ithilmar armour is something even dwarfs would begrudgingly would say is of the highest quality a warrior with this armour can sustain multiple blows that otherwise would be deadly.
This armour is a sight to behold made in the heart of a volcano by master smiths from vaul this armour is not only made by the finest materials it is also magicly enchanted.
This armour is made with skills now lost to the elves this is the armour which only elves of the highest rank may wield.

column1: druchii_sea_dragon_cloak_descThe cloak can be drawn tightly around the body when fired at,acting as a shield against missile fire. The scales are skillfully joined together to give a cloak that is flexible,yet tough enough to deflect enemy blows. These scaled cloaks are light,flexible and incredibly tough.

column2: Forged from meteoric steel,this suit is almost impossible to pierce.
Forged from black meteoric steel,this suit is almost impossible to pierce.
